pages.text: Upgrade the tier of a block in world, without needing to put it in a crafting grid.$(p)Can upgrade factory machines, Bins, and Energy Cubes
Upgrades block to basic tier. Used to turn machines into their factory variant.
Upgrades block to Advanced tier. Requires block to be Basic tier.
Upgrades block to Elite tier. Requires block to be Advanced tier.
Upgrades block to Ultimate tier. Requires block to be Elite tier.
